title: a1990
message:
Gave up waiting for device to transition from DFU state to DFU state.  [com.apple.MobileDevice.MobileRestore – 0xFCA (4042)]

can you please explain this error

title: a1990
message:
Not sure if even Apple has a good explanation for this.
At least never will make it public availabla.
They found several ways to break working machines, out of warranty...
